name: Abandoned Area Escape - Room Escape Game
name_original: Abandoned Area Escape - Room Escape Game
description:
Abandoned Area Escape is point & click escape adventure game
Explore a scary old abandoned factory. Invited by a trusted friend you head deeper within, except all is not what it seems in this derelict place. Something dark lurks within, something creepy and in-human. Will you get out alive?

Don't forget to click on the large camera, tape recorder, phone and the secret documents in ITEMS to see the pictures you took, hear the tapes you've found and read the secret docs and phone messages!!
